CustomField.description: This is a required field. This field indicates as a percentage, the ratio of the applicant's or borrower's total monthly debt to the total monthly income relied on in making the credit decision.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter NA on purchased loans, when no credit decision was made (closed of incompleteness), No DTI relied upon, Applicant AND Co-applicant are both non-natural persons.
CustomField.label: Debt-to-Income Ratio
